title: How to Found Huawei's Authorized Service Center in Kuwait
answer:
**Opening of the Authorized Huawei Customer Service Center**

Attention please, the **Authorized** Huawei Customer Service Center is Future Integrated Technology . This is Huawei's **Authorized** customer center in Kuwait. This Customer Service Center is located in Kuwait city, near the JIBLE (Blockat). It has convenient transportation and a bustling commercial circle, covering the All customer group and providing service for customers living in Kuwait. 

You can enjoy Huawei's professional and convenient one-stop service when you go shopping. At the Huawei Service Center, you can enjoy after-sales services, try our products, and learn about Huawei's service culture. 

 Address: Kuwait city – JIBLE (Blockat), Mubarak Al Kaber Street, Commercial Area Number 9, Building Number 8 Kuwait.  
  If you have any doubt, please call +965-1844442.
keywords: How to Found Huawei's Authorized Service Center in Kuwait
